usefulItems: bowl, baking tray (30 x 40 cm), baking paper, sealable container, oven
title: Spiced nut clusters

preparations.content: Preheat oven to 150°C. Line a baking tray (30 x 40 cm) with baking paper and set side.

Place cumin seeds, chilli flakes, sesame seeds and salt into mixing bowl and toast <b>5 min/Varoma/speed 1<b>. Allow to cool for 1 minute, then mill <b>10 sec/speed 7<b>. Transfer into a bowl and set aside. Do not clean mixing bowl.
<b>Insert butterfly whisk. <b>Place egg white into mixing bowl and whip <b>30 sec/speed 4<b>. <b>Remove butterfly whisk.<b>
Add mixed nuts and reserved spices and combine <b>20 sec//speed 2<b>. Transfer mixture onto prepared baking tray, ensuring nuts are touching to allow clusters to form.
Bake for 20 minutes (150°C). Break nuts into clusters of preferred size. Serve warm or cool, or transfer into a sealable container until ready to serve.

hintsAndTricks: You can replace chilli flakes with smoked paprika.
You can easily double this recipe; you can store leftovers in a sealable container in a cool, dark place for up to 2 weeks.
